boosterDaily: 'cause ye be a booster, ye 'ave received double the normal rewards amount!
noItemProvided: Please specify an item from the shop t' buy!
unknownColor: Sorry, I don't recognize the color {color}.Make sure ye choose a proper color from \` +shop colors\`!
notEnoughCurrency: Sorry, ye don't 'ave enough {currency} fer that there!
channelPurchaseSuccess: Ye 'ave purchased a private channel! ye can edit yer channel 'ere: {channelLink}
bugNoArguments:
Please describe the bug properly.
Mention details o' 'ow the bug 'as occurred, fer which role an' in which game. Do mention details o' expected an' observed results.
 if ye 'ave any screenshots to add, create a bug with above mentioned details. Then go to the url generated an' add yer screenshots in the comments o' the issue.
bugNoGameServer: Images attached to a bug from the game server cannot be submitted! please use the link below to add yer attachments.
bugSuccess:
The bug 'as successfully been reported! please provide any screenshots or more information 'ere:
{url}
suggestNoArguments:
Please describe the suggestion properly.
 mention details o' 'ow ye want to improve current system / 'ow yer idea be effective an' needs to be added in wovsim. Do mention the difference in current system an' yer idea if applicable.
 if ye 'ave any screenshots / details to add, create an issue with above mentioned details. Then go to the url generated an' add yer them in the comments o' the suggestion.
suggestNoGameServer: Images attached to a suggestion from the game server cannot be submitted! please use the link below to add yer attachments.
suggestSuccess:
Yer suggestion been sent! please provide any screenshots or more information 'ere:
{url}
timeNoDuration: 'ow long it should be? ye forgot to state the duration.
specialRoleMissing: I be unable to find a special role assigned to ye! if ye 'ave one, report this here usin' `+bug`.
colorChanged: Done! yer special role color been changed!
nameSuccess: Done! yer special role's name been changed to {name}.
profileNeedToBuy: Ye need to buy the profile command in order to use it!
profileLocked: This here player does not 'ave their profile unlocked from the shop!
shopFooter: Use `+buy <color> role` to purchase a color.
noMentionPriv: Do not mention your private channel!
gameServerMaxLength: The maximum length for messages is {length} characters!
gameServerOneLine: You can only send one line per message!
pingMessage: Hey there, I'm {name}! My prefix is {prefix}, and you can use `${prefix}help` to see all my commands!
maintenance: Sorry, the bot is currently in maintenance mode!
blacklisted: You are blacklisted! You can no longer use any commands.
commandRestrictGameServer: That command can only be used in the game server!
error: An error occured when trying to execute this command. The developers have been notified.
languageChange: Your language has been set to {language}!
voteWhileDead: You are dead,  you can't vote.
spectateDead: Sorry, you're dead. You can't switch to a spectator now.
narrateSecondMini: Unfortunately, you aren't the host, and because you're a narrator in training, you aren't allowed to narrate spectate!
notNarrator: Sorry, you must be a narrator to do this!
gameBanned: You are game banned! You cannot join any games.
joinedLink: {ping}, use the link above to join the game!
alreadyJoined: You have already joined the game! Check {channel} for the link!
